ygData.subject: Re: Level 7
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/23/99 10:25:05 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Level 7 is very difficult, the pet is not very useful at that level. Level 11 was also rather
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/23/99 10:25:05 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
peh2000@... writes:

> Just looking for a little encouragement, was Level 7 the most difficult
> for everyone? I'm struggling to get to 8, my pet doesn't seem to help
> much and my Mana regeneration is very slow, even with meditate. I know
> things get better at 8 but will every level like this (11,15,19 etc.)
> be this difficult? Or is just me? My ranger character advanced easily
> until he hit the teens so this has been frustrating. Is grouping the
> only solution to problems like these? Not my first choice....

Level 7 is very difficult, the pet is not very useful at that level.

Level 11 was also rather difficult, though I was grouping so it was not too
bad.

The bad thing is, Verant changed the pet spell. The rank 4 (level 12) pet
spell summons a pet that ranges from 8 to 12, not 11 to 13 like it should...
So you can STILL often get useless pets. (the last time I summoned I had to
cast 6 times to get a pet that did not con green to me)

Sonoroud
